Crimes.Review_Outcome: No substantive impact despite procedural breach
Crimes.Assessment_Standard: Relevance, probative value, timeliness of evidence

Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Failure to rule on post-hearing evidence application

Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Late submission of evidence without adequate explanation
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Significant credibility concerns affecting overall claim
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Allegation of procedural unfairness due to unaddressed evidence
Crimes.Jurisdictional_Focus: Canada – Federal Court review of RPD decision
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Failure to decide on admissibility of post-hearing evidence
Crimes.Omission_Type: Failure to acknowledge or rule on submitted application and evidence
